definition: to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: They will study at home on computers.
sentences.chinese: 他们将在家用电脑上课。

sentences.english: My friend said he could always arrange his schedule around your schedule.
sentences.chinese: 我朋友说他可以根据你的课程表来调整他上课的时间。

sentences.english: I'd like it if school was cancelled today.
sentences.chinese: 学校今天不上课就好了。

sentences.english: Which teacher was your son having a lesson with?
sentences.chinese: 您的儿子跟那一位老师上课？

sentences.english: Readings must be completed before the class number noted.
sentences.chinese: 在每堂课上课前，需读完该课标注中的阅读资料。

sentences.english: He began the class with a story.
sentences.chinese: 他在开始上课时讲了一个故事。

sentences.english: Hero's classes will be held at the Ruskin School of Drawing and Fine Art.
sentences.chinese: 赫罗的上课地点将在拉斯金绘画和美术学院。

sentences.english: I'll just eat toast on the way to class.
sentences.chinese: 我会在去上课的路上吃吐司面包。

sentences.english: You have to write teaching plans for every class. School will check them.
sentences.chinese: 在上课之前你必须写出教案，学校会定期检查。

sentences.english: Kiddies, let's guess a riddle before our class, OK?
sentences.chinese: 在上课之前，小朋友们，我们猜个谜语，好不好？

sentences.english: The child often plays in class.
sentences.chinese: 这孩子上课爱搞小动作。

sentences.english: They are listening to the teacher.
Christmas is a time for gladness and rejoicing ...because there is no class.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节是欢喜和快乐的时光，因为不用上课。

sentences.english: The next class the professor handed the tests back out.
sentences.chinese: 下次上课时，教授将考卷发下去。

sentences.english: We'll be meeting in Room 115 instead.
A four-day school week sounds like a great idea for students and teachers.
sentences.chinese: 每周上课四天对老师和学生来说似乎都是很好的主意。

definition: to attend a class/to go to a lecture
to study outside of class time (reviewing one's lessons)/to study in one's free time/individual study
teacher in charge of a class
to drag out a lesson/to insist on extending class after the bell
to go to school/to attend school
